Content.Text:
<MYNAME>!
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dum-Da-Da-DAA!
The Harvest Goddess is here!
<PAGE>
I've heard about you, <MYNAME>!
You're up to something interesting now,
aren't you?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why, the <RED>town restoration</RED> of course!
Revitalizing the town sounds like so
much fun!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee!
<MYNAME>, you really are a go-getter!
<PAGE>
And I am the Harvest Goddess who watches
over this place! So I'm going to help
you revitalize the town!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aaron, Alice, come out!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry to keep you waiting!
What do you need us for, Harvest
Goddess?

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want you to teach <MYNAME> how to
get special gifts from the forest!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Harvest Goddess, are you sure you should
do that? Such special gifts...

<FACE_GODDES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
As Harvest Goddess, sometimes
I have to step in and help out
human beings!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Okay...
Leave it to us!

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And now, I have matters to attend to...
I will return to my spring! These two
will explain everything.

<FACE_GODDES><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good luck, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, <MYNAME>.
We'll explain how to receive gifts from
the forest.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, see that big tree over there?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you hit that big tree with your
<GREEN>hammer</GREEN>, a bunch of items
will fall to the ground!
<PAGE>
But you have to hit it the right way!
Look at the bottom of the tree.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hit it on this spot where the tree is
a different color. If you hit it
anywhere else, no items will drop.
<PAGE>
You can only hit it <RED>once per day</RED>.
So be sure to come hit it every day and
get lots of items!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that's how it works!
Good luck, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You dummy, Aaron! You haven't explained
the kinds of branches and rocks
that you can get!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I, uh, forgot about that...
Sorry, sis!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're hopeless!
I'll explain.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some types of rocks and branches you
can only turn into materials with an
<GREEN>upgraded hammer or axe</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
The axe and hammer you can get here in
town will only turn <GREEN>small rocks</GREEN> and
<GREEN>small branches</GREEN> into materials.
<PAGE>
To make materials from <GREEN>branches</GREEN>
and <GREEN>rocks</GREEN> or to chop <GREEN>evergreens</GREEN>,
you will need a better axe and hammer.

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
How do you make a better hammer or axe?
Use your head, dummy!
<PAGE>
If there was a <BLUE>blacksmith</BLUE> living
in town, they might give you a blueprint
or two, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Not for free, of course! You have to
<RED>make friends</RED> with them first and
<RED>give them gifts they like</RED>. 
<PAGE>
A blacksmith probably likes <GREEN>ore</GREEN>,
<GREEN>items that can be turned into materials</GREEN>,
and <GREEN>flowers</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Seriously, isn't the whole reason you're
building houses to attract new residents
who provide these kinds of services?

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're a real evil genius, Sis!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
What did you say?
I dare you to repeat that!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh, I gotta go, <MYNAME>!
I hope you get a lot of use, out of
the gifts of the forest!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That little...
I'll deal with him!
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'm going home, too.
The Harvest Goddess is counting on you,
so don't screw it up!
